course_description: Electrostatics, Poisson and Laplace equations, steady currents and electromagnetic induction, magnetostatics, integral and differential forms of Maxwell equations, propagation of electromagnetic waves, fundamental laws of optics, basic laws of radiation
prerequisites: PHYS 220 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - N304
